text: Læw phraxngkh k thrng prathan kæ phwk cea sung khwam plxdphay hlangcak khwam sera sok nan khux hı mi kar ngib hlab khrxbkhlum klum hnung nı hmu phwk cea læa xik klum hnung nan taw khxng phwk khea xeng thahı phwk khea kk ra wn kraway cı phwk khea klawha xallxh doy prascak khwam pen thrrm xyang phwk smay ngmngay (xalya hi li yah) phwk khea klaw wa mi sing hnung sing dı cak kickar nan pen siththi khxng rea bang him? Cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa thæcring kickar nan thanghmd pen siththi khx ngxallxh theanan phwk khea pkpid wi nı cı khxng phwk khea sing sung phwk khea ca mi peidphey kæ cea phwk khea klaw wa hak prakt wa mi sing hnung sing dı cak kickar nan pen siththi khxng rea læw sir phwk rea k mi thuk kha tay thi ni cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa mæ prakt wa phwk than xyu nı ban khxng phwk than ktam nænxn brrda phu thi kar kha di thuk kahnd kæ phwk khea k ca xxk pi su thinxn tay khxng phwk khea læa pheux thi xallxh ca thrng thdsxb sing thi xyu nı hawxk khxng phwk cea læa xallxh nan pen phuthrng rxbru sing thi xyu hawxk thanghlay
